DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate drug interaction fostamatinib digoxin compare safety , tolerability plasma concentration digoxin administer alone fostamatinib healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Administration Fostamatinib Blood Concentrations Digoxin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure Male female subject age 18 45 year ( inclusive ) Minimum weight 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Female subject must negative pregnancy test screen Day 1 , must lactate , must nonchildbearing potential History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug ( except cholecystectomy ) Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Subjects smoke 5 cigarette equivalent tobacco per day Absolute neutrophil count < 2500/mm3 2.5 x 109/L Previous treatment fostamatinib digoxin present study
